mapper.select: select u.`id`, `username`, `nickname`, `email`, `avatar`, `phone_number`, `status`, u.`create_time`, u.`modified_time`, `sex`, `salt`, `type`, `password`, `birth`, `department_id`, `deleted`,d.name as name from tb_user u inner join tb_department d on u.department_id = d.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
